desc_taxi: Gira Bairro Táxi, is a young company, looking to the future and a commitment to contribute to the economic growth of the Province and even of the country, carrying out personalized Taxi activity door to door.
O que é necessário para fazer parceria?: What does it take to partner?
Ter uma viatura ligeira ou de passageiro: Have a light or passenger vehicle
Ter senso de responsabilidade, assiduid: Have a sense of responsibility, assiduity, punctuality
Para quem não tem emprego, mas tem uma v: For those who do not have a job, but have a car, here they have a great opportunity to have their own work and income
Poder criar mais postos de trabalho e au: Being able to create more jobs and increase their income
Nenhum automóvel encontrado para este se: No cars found for this service
